description: A simple API that returns the current server time in various formats.

parsed_description.main: Get the current time for a specified timezone using the timeapi.io API.
parsed_description.args: params: TZ_Name object containing the timezone name
parsed_description.returns: str: JSON response from the API with current time information
parsed_description.raises: Exception: If the API request fails after maximum retries

TZ_Name.description: Parameters for specifying the name of the timezone for which to find out the current time.

tz_name.description: Name of the timezone for which to find out the current time
tz_name.title: Tz Name

TZ_Name.title: TZ_Name
